DEATHKNIGHT_UNHOLY:
Use Power Infusion on the Unholy Death Knight when:

  • Their Gargoyle is active and has less than 22 seconds remaining, or they are using Army of the Dead with an active Abomination or Army Ghouls under 18 seconds remaining.
  • They have Dark Transformation active, especially during multi-target scenarios with 3 or more enemies.
  • They are in a multi-target encounter (3+ enemies) with Death and Decay actively damaging enemies.
  • Their core cooldowns align with a burst window, such as during Gargoyle summoning or Army of the Dead activation, even if specific pets are not present.
DEMONHUNTER_HAVOC:
Use Power Infusion on the Havoc Demon Hunter when:

  • The Demon Hunter is transformed via Metamorphosis, enhancing their burst damage window.
  • The encounter is in its final 20 seconds, ensuring maximum value from cooldowns before the fight ends.
DRUID_BALANCE:
Use Power Infusion on the Balance Druid when:

  • Their Celestial Alignment or Incarnation: Chosen of Elune is active to amplify their burst damage window.
  • They are about to enter a high-priority phase requiring burst damage, such as executing a pre-planned cooldown stacking sequence.
  • Their rotation aligns with major trinket procs or external buffs that synergize with their damage output.
DRUID_FERAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Feral Druid when:

  • The Feral Druid has Incarnation: Avatar of Ashamane active, or
  • They are specced into Incarnation instead of Berserk: Heart of the Lion.
HUNTER_MARKSMANSHIP:
Use Power Infusion on the Marksmanship Hunter when:

  • The hunter has an active Trueshot buff with more than 12 seconds remaining to amplify their burst window.
  • The encounter is within the final 13 seconds to maximize damage output before the fight ends.
HUNTER_SURVIVAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Survival Hunter when:

  • Coordinated Assault is active on the Hunter.
  • Spearhead is available and the Hunter does not have the Coordinated Assault talent.
  • The Hunter has neither the Spearhead nor Coordinated Assault talents selected.
MAGE_ARCANE:
Use Power Infusion on the Arcane Mage when:

  • The Mage has cast Arcane Surge and does not have the Spymaster's Web equipped.
  • The Mage has cast Evocation and has the Spymaster's Web equipped.
MAGE_FIRE:
Use Power Infusion on the Fire Mage when:

  • their Combustion is coming off cooldown and ready to be precast
  • they are in Combustion with more than 7 seconds remaining on the buff
  • the encounter will end in under 20 seconds
MAGE_FROST:
Use Power Infusion on the Frost Mage when:

  • Their Icy Veins is active to amplify their burst damage window.
  • They are casting Frozen Orb or Comet Storm to maximize area-of-effect damage potential.
  • They are under the effects of Time Warp or Bloodlust to stack haste synergies.
  • Their Power Infusion buff is not already active, ensuring optimal cooldown alignment.
PALADIN_RETRIBUTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Retribution Paladin when:

  • The paladin has Avenging Wrath active.
  • The paladin’s Crusade effect is active.
  • The target is affected by the Execution Sentence debuff.
PRIEST_SHADOW:
Use Power Infusion on the Shadow Priest when:

  • They are in Voidform.
  • They have Dark Ascension active.
  • They are equipped with the TWW2 4-piece set.
ROGUE_ASSASSINATION:
Use Power Infusion on the Assassination Rogue when:

  • The Rogue has Deathmark active on their target to amplify their burst damage window.
ROGUE_SUBTLETY:
Use Power Infusion on the Subtlety Rogue when:

  • The Rogue has Shadow Dance active to amplify their burst damage during this critical ability window.
SHAMAN_ELEMENTAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Elemental Shaman when:

  • They have Ascendance active to amplify their strongest burst window.
  • Ascendance is unavailable (with over 30 seconds remaining on its cooldown), ensuring alignment with their next high-priority cooldown such as Stormkeeper.
SHAMAN_ENHANCEMENT:
使用 能量灌注 在增强萨满时：

  • 当升腾激活时。
  • 当幽灵狼激活时。
  • 当末日之风激活时。
  • 当战斗剩余时间在最后20秒内时。
  • 当萨满的主要天赋技能冷却时间超过120秒时。
  • 如果萨满未选择升腾、幽灵狼或末日之风天赋时。
WARLOCK_AFFLICTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Affliction Warlock when:

  • The warlock is actively using Summon Darkglare alongside their other major offensive cooldowns to amplify burst damage.
  • Their damage rotation aligns with pre-set cooldown windows (trinkets, racial abilities, or encounter-specific timing) for maximum multiplicative value.
WARLOCK_DEMONOLOGY:
Use Power Infusion on the Demonology Warlock when:

  • The Warlock's imps are about to despawn within two GCDs plus Summon Demonic Tyrant's cast time.
  • Their last cast was Hand of Gul'dan or Ruination.
  • Either their imps will despawn within one GCD plus Tyrant's cast time or they have fewer than 2 Soul Shards remaining.
WARLOCK_DESTRUCTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Destruction Warlock when:

  • The Warlock has an active Infernal summoned during their burst window.
  • The Warlock does not use the Summon Infernal talent, prioritizing your cooldown for their core rotation.
  • The encounter is in its final moments, where delaying Power Infusion would risk wasting its benefit.
WARRIOR_FURY:
Use Power Infusion on the Fury Warrior when:

  • Avatar has over 15 seconds remaining and the encounter duration is at least 135 seconds.
  • The target is in Execute Phase (below 20% health) and Avatar is active.
  • The encounter will end within 25 seconds, ensuring a final use of Power Infusion.
